info.title: OCR for Images and multi-page PDF
info.description:
The free OCR API provides you with a simple way of parsing images and getting text results in JSON. The API can be used from any internet-connected device (desktop, mobile, iPhone, Android, Windows phone, refrigerator...). The API allows one image or one multi-page PDF document to be parsed at once. 

The free API key ("helloworld") allows for 500 requests/day or 15000 requests/month per IP address. So if you use this key inside a mobile phone app, every user would have 500 requests/day. If you need more requests, this is also free. Just email us for a different API key. We enjoy providing this free OCR API, but the API comes with no warranty.

post.description: The free OCR API allows one image or one multi-page PDF document to be parsed at once. It returns the extracted text and (optional) its position (overlay).
